from __future__ import print_function
t=input()
i=0
A=[]
max=[0]*t
maxcount=[0]*t
while(i<t):
    
    size=input()
    A=map(int, raw_input().split())
   
    hash_table=[0]*10001
    for x in range(0,size):
        hash_table[A[x]]+=1
        
    for x in range(0,10001):
        if(hash_table[max[i]]<hash_table[x]):
            max[i]=x
            maxcount[i]=hash_table[x]
    i=i+1
for y in range(0,t):
    print(max[y],end=" ") 
    print(maxcount[y],end="\n")
